---
title: 1st Sternocostal Joint
subtitle: 1st rib
---


The 1st sternocostal joint is found immediately inferior to the sternoclavicular joint @neumannKinesiologyMusculoskeletalSystem2017.

The 1st sternocostal joint is an articulation between the costal cartilage of the [1st rib]({{< var ref-1st-rib-bone.path >}}) with the costal facets of the [sternum]({{< var ref-sternum-bone.path >}}) @neumannKinesiologyMusculoskeletalSystem2017.
